channel.title: Marines not firing from custom MP5 model
channel.description:
Hi,
First of all, I don't know is this the right forum to post this, but I have a problem. I've replaced MP5 with custom M4 skin/model for HL2 (swapped the .mdl's). It's all working, but the marines are not firing form it. They just stand and aim at me, but nothing else. However, they still can meele. I can use that skin without problems. Am I doing something wrong? Can somebody help me with this issue?
Also, there is one strange thing - I've replaced it back with a backup of the original MP5, but the marines are still not using it...

item.title: Marines not firing from custom MP5 model
item.dc:creator: Yard1
item.description:
The problem is, that I’ve not made that model, and I have zero experience with modeling. But as I said, strange thing is that even when I’ve replaced it with original MP5, marines are still not using it… I will check it again when I start a new game with original MP5.

Read full topic
item.source: Marines not firing from custom MP5 model

item.title: Marines not firing from custom MP5 model
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
There might be some things unique to Black Mesa’s weapon models which are not in Half-Life 2’s, you could probaly edit this if you can use 3ds Max or a program like it.

Read full topic
item.source: Marines not firing from custom MP5 model
